label: adjustedBalanceOutAmount
comment: A monetary value that is an adjusted amount balanced out for this trade settlement header monetary summation.
A monetary value that is an adjusted amount balanced out for this trade settlement payment monetary summation.

rangeIncludes.comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of monetary amount totals, specified at header level, for a trade settlement.
A collection of monetary amount totals specified for a trade settlement payment.
